availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James P. Whitlow (Warren County, KY, laborer)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Whitlow. Married to Sarah A. Pedigo Whitlow in Barren County, Kentucky, on January 27, 1853. Father of D.F. Whitlow and James Franklin Whitlow. Farmer in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 2, p. 420B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 842.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994027, Barren County Marriages, p. 3.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994027, Barren County Births, p. 8.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 16909.
